titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
1823, Jan. 1. W. Liberal, Ã§ala. Call on Whitaker
&
Bain
: mesds Robinson, Williams & C Colnet at tea.

2. Th. Call on Barber
,
Cooper
,
Bt
&
Longman
: Bt
& Booth call: Bethams sup.

3. F. Castruccio, p. 190. Call on Macgowan
&
Peacock
.

4. Sa. Castruccio, p. 227. Call on Davison
&
Prowet
: theatre, Simpson & Co : meet Hanson .
Jan. 5. Su. Castruccio, p. 306.

6. M. Castruccio, Vol. III, p. 21. Call on
Davison
.

7. Tu. Castruccio, p. 97. Call on R Taylor
&
Bain
: Hd Ht dines.

8. W. Castruccio, p. 151. Booth calls: call on Jackson (Fladgate)
: C Colnet dines.

9. Th. Castruccio, p. 276. Call on Macready
n : Bt au soir. Reply of Spain to the Holy Allies.
10. F. Castruccio, p. 314. Theatre, 1/2 Artaxerxes, & London Stars.

11. Sa. Bandello, Romeo, p. 49. Call on
J Taylor
, &
Jackson (Fladgate)
n : Hd Ht dines.

Jan. 12. Su. Bandello, Romeo, p. 73; Viola, p. 40.
Hd Ht sups, ppc .

13. M. Bandello, p. 52. Call on Jackson
,
Whitaker
,
R Taylor
n ,
Wallace
, &
Macmillan
n : T T calls: Hudson dines. Dante, C. XXIX.

14. Tu. B Letter to Wedgwood . Bandello, Tom. I, p. 28. T T calls: call on
Macmillan
&
Rodd
.
Theatre, Blind Girl; adv. Skeffington
.
Booth published.

15. W. Write to Wedgwood . Dante, C. XXX: Southey, Vision of Jt : call on Prouet
: T T dines.

16. Th. Dante, C. XXXI. Call on Sturmy
&
Bain
.
17. F. Bandello, p. 80. T T calls: Hudsons & H M at tea: Stewart calls na .

18. Sa. Bandello, p. 94: Royal King (Heywood). Call on Hayward
: Booth au soir.
Jan. 19. Su. Dante, C. XXXI: Bandello, p. 166.
20. M. Dante, C. XXXII: Bandello, p. 194: Peveril, p. 71. Meet T T : Whitaker & Blaquiere call: Stewart at tea.

21. Tu. Peveril, p. 302. T T calls: call on
Hanson
n ,
Curtis jr
, &
Ayrton
n .

22. W. Peveril, Vol. II. Call on Hanson
n : theatre, Henry VIII, acts 1 & 2.

23. Th. Peveril, Vol. III. Call on Curtis
,
mrs Betham
&
Hanson
.
24. F. Peveril, Vol. IV, p. 220. Betham calls: theatre, 1/2 Cymbeline. Letter sent, L B to S T S .

25. Sa. Write to Isa. Booth . Peveril, p. 320, fin: Bandello, p. 200. Call on Hookham
, &
St James
: theatre, Henry VIII, act 3.

Jan. 26. M. Su. Dante, C. XXXIII: Bandello, p. 244. Call on Hayward
&
Betham
. Write to Hayward .

27. Tu. M. Dante, Paradiso, 1/2 C. I: Bandello, p. 278. Call on Hayward
,
R Baxter
n , &
St Mildred
n : Stewart at tea; adv. Shepherd
.
Hutton dies. Writ of error.

28. W. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. Dante, Paradiso, C. I: Bandello, p. 286. Call on Sturmy
: Booth & mrs Williams at tea: theatre, Nigel. Speech of Louis 18: war with Spain .

29. W. Commonwealth, p. 56/2, 57/2. The. Cibber, Ã§ala. Call on Spier
.

30. Th. Commonwealth, p. 58/2. Call on Bain
,
J Lowndes
, &
Lamb
n .

31. F. Write to Lamb . Dante, 1/2 C. II. Meet Colburn : call on Northcote ; adv. Hazlit
. Frederic Robinson, Chancellor of Exchr .

Feb. 1. Sa. Write to Hanson . Dante, C. II. Call on St James church
,
John Hunt
&
Triphook
: Stewart & Shepherd at tea: tea
theatre, 1/2 Stoops to Conquer.

Feb. 2. Su. Dante, C. III: Bandello, p. 323. Call on Bt
.
3. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Dante, C. III: Bandello, p. 348. R Taylor & Lamb call. Black fog.

4. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 58. Dante, C. IV: Bandello, p. 360. Call on Hanson
,
Macgowan
&
Peacock
: Hume dines. Parliament meets.

5. W. Dante, C. IV. M calls: call on
R Taylor
, &
Ayrton
n .

6. Th. Commonwealth, notes. Dante, C. VI: Bandello, p. 400.
R Taylor calls, & Toswill . S T S to L Byron .

7. F. Commonwealth, p. 59/2. Dante, C. VII: Bandello, T. II, p. 17. Call on Clarke, Piccadilly , for Toswill
: theatre, Swipes; adv. S R Phillips
.
Mrs Radcliffe dies.

8. Sa. Commonwalth, Ã§ala. Dante, 1/2 C. VIII, Bandello, p. 36. Call on Hume
,
Lamb
, &
Harbone
&
Bain
. meet Booth at Hunterâs
.
Feb. 9. Su. Commonwealth, p. 61/2. Write to Ayrton . Dante, C. VIII: Bandello, p. 46. Pilcher sups.

10. M. Giddiness. Dante, Ã§ala: Bandello, p. 54. Call on Curtis jr
,
W B Whitaker
,
Saunders
n , &
Wallace
: Stewart calls: theatre, Lear w. ye end (adv. OâBrien ).

11. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 62/2. Dante, 1/2 C. IX: Bandello, p. 66. Call on Whitaker
na ,
Black
, &
Rodd
: M & Hudson call.

12. W. Commonwealth, p 63/2. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Dante, C. IX. Call on
Whitaker
,
Orme
,
Hayward
, &
E White
.

13. Th. Commonwealth, p. 64. Write to Kean . Dante, 1/2 C. X: Bandello, p. 78. Call on mrs Ayrton
. Letter to Kean .

14. F. Giddiness. Dante, C. X: Bandello, p. 104: Picture, acts 1 & 2. Ayrton calls: call on Aldis
n &
Skeffington
n : S Fell at tea.

15. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 66. Dante, 1/2 C. XI: Picture, fin.
Theatre, 1/2 Love in Village, & Deaf as Post.

Feb. 16. Su. Commonwealth, p. 67/2. Dante, C. XI: Bandello, p. 124. Call on Hayward ; adv. J Richter
.

17. M. Commonwealth, p. 68/2. Dante, C. XII, v. 17: Bandello, p. 151. Call on Wallace
&
Saunders
; C Stewart sups.
18. Tu. Giddiness. Commonwealth, p. 68. Write to M W S . Dante, 1/2 C. XII: Bandello, p. 227.

19. W. Commonwealth, p. 69. Dante, C. XII: Malfy, act 1 & 2. Aldis calls: call on Rodd
. Attempted change of Spanish Ministers .
Valperga published
.

20. Th. Commonwealth, p. 70. Dante, 1/2 C. XIII: Malfy, fin. Call on Pouncy
: theatre, Duel.

21. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Dante, C. XIII. Call on Davison
: Flather calls.

22. Sa. Commonwealth, 10 lines. Dante, 1/2 C. XIV: Bandello, p. 244. Call on Export Excise Office ,
Bt
n ,
Lamb
,
Peacock
, &
Macmillan
.

Feb. 23. Su. Commonwealth, p. 71. Dante, C. XIV: Bandello, p. 256. Call on Davison
&
Hayward
.

24. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Hogg calls, & P P : call on L C Lamb
n : Stewart au soir: theatre, Lear, act 1; meet Skeffington
.
25. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 72. Dante, 1/2 C. XV: Bandello, p. 287.

26. W. Commonwealth, p. 73. Giddiness. Bandello, p. 347. Call on Whitaker
: P P dines; adv. Hudson
. J P Kemble dies .

27. Th. Commonwealth, 1 page. Bandello, p. 355. Call on Pouncy
&
L C Lamb
: mrs Williams & H Pilcher call. Write to Coleridge .
28. F. Commonwealth, p. 74. Bandello, p. 370.
Mar. 1. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 76. M & R Taylor call.

Mar. 2. Su. Commonwealth, p. 77, & 1 page. Call on Hayward
: H P dines; adv. S Fell
.

3. M. Commonwealth, p. 78. Sup at Lambâs ; adv. R & E Norris
. Expulsion of Manuel .

4. Tu. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Museum, CartÃ©s Ormond . Call on Pouncy
: theatre, Fontainebleau.

5. W. Commonwealth, p. 79. Call on Hume
.

6. Th. Commonwealth, p. 82. Call on L C Lamb (adv. miss Richardson & Dr Roe ),
Macgowan
&
Rodd
.

7. F. Commonwealth, p. 84. Call on Macmillan
: Hume & H P dine.

8. Sa. Giddiness. Commonwealth, p. 86. Call on Excise
, &
Bain

Mar. 9. Su. Giddiness. Commonwealth, p. 88. Call on
Hayward
.
10. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. M calls: theatre, K. John.
11. Tu. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Macmillan calls: Stewart & H P sup.

12. W. Commonwealth, p. 89/2, & 1 page. Call on Pouncy
: Museum, Nalson .
13. Th. Commonwealth, p. 92. L C Lamb calls, M & P P : theatre, 1/3 Figaro.
14. F. Commonwealth, p. 94/2. Museum, Carte . Dumouriez dies .

15. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 95. Call on Prince
: theatre, Julian: H P sups: Booth at tea. Write to Taylor, Norwich
, & L C Lamb . EnrhumÃ©, 9 days.
Mar. 16. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala.

17. M. Commonwealth, p. 96. Office, Bow Street : call on Peacock
.

18. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 98. Write to M W S . Call on Sturmy
&
J Taylor
.
19. W. Commonwealth, p. 100.
20. Th. Commonwealth, p. 101. Hudson sups.
21. F. Commonwealth, p. 103/2. Lamb & M call.
22. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 104/2. H & A Boinville call.
Mar. 23. Su. Commonwealth, p. 106/2. Bandello, p. 400.
24. M. Commonwealth, p. 106. Bandello, p. 416; T. III, p. 24. Call on M Lamb; invitÃ©s au soir : Hudson dines.

25. Tu.
Museum; Carte . Bandello, p. 54. Lambs & H M sup.
26. W. Commonwealth, p. 107. Write to Colburn . Bandello, p. 64.

27. Th. Commonwealth, p. 109/2. Bandello, p. 74. Call on Colburn
: Wordsworth calls n .

28. F. Commonwealth, p. 110: Bandello, p. 86. Call on Northcote
.
29. Sa. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. M calls: H P sups.
Mar. 30. Su. Commonwealth, p. 112/2.
31. M. Commonwealth, p. 114/2. Booth & E White call.

Apr. 1. Tu. Giddiness. Commonwealth, p. 114. R Taylor , miss Cary , & Saunders (fr. Colburn ) calls: H P sups, adv. P P
.
2. W. Commonwealth, p. 116/2. Saunders calls: meet Saunders : H & P P sup.

3. Th. Commonwealth, p. 117. Macmillan calls: call on Wallace
.
4. F. Commonwealth, p. 119. E White & H P at tea.
5. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 122/2: Write to Ayrton .
Apr. 6. M. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. H P sups. Southwold Smith calls.
7. M. Commonwealth, p. 123. Wordsworth & Booth call: Kenney sups: meet Hill : theatre, 1/2 Macbeth. French enter Spain

8. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 126/2. Kenney & H P call:
Olympic, Alexandre; w. M J
.
9. W. Commonwealth, p. 128/2. Meet Colburn .
10. Th. Commonwealth, p. 130/2: Preface, 1 page. Ada Reis, fin. Hayward calls. Bandello, p. 97.

11. F. Commonwealth, p. 131. Hayward n & Peacock call: call on R Taylor
: Kenney & H P sup.
12. Sa. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Seek Whitaker : Ayrton calls.

Apr. 13. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on Hayward
: H P dines. N G calls.
14. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Theatre, 1/2 Macbeth.

15. Tu. Commonwealth, 2 pp. Call on Whitaker
n &
Macgowan
n .

16. W. Commonwealth. Call on Whitaker
&
Macgowan
: LubÃ© calls: theatre, 3/10 Much Ado.
17. Th. Commonwealth, Ã§ala.

18. F. Commonwealth, p. 132. Call on Hume
&
Hudson
: Kenney & H M sup.
19. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 133. Three miss Lambs call.

Apr. 20. Su. Commonwealth, p. 135. Call on Hayward
&
Peacock
.

21. M. Commonwealth, p. 137. Call on Reeves
n : theatre, 1/10 Othello: H P sups.

22. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 138. Call on Whitaker
, &
Wilman , for Bt
: D Constable & Innes call: Kenney at tea: LubÃ© & H P sup.

23. W. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Hayward calls, fr. Read
n : call on Whitaker
,
Northcote
&
Hayward
.

24. Th. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on Rees (Longmâs)
: theatre, 1/2 K John.

25. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Stewart calls: mrs Williams at tea: call on Rodd
.

26. Sa. Write to R Taylor . Call on Davison
,
R Taylor
n ,
Pouncy
&
Cary
.

Apr. 27. Su. Commonwealth, p. 140. Call on Hayward
, &
Blatspeil
na : seek E White : R Taylor & N G call.

28. M. Commonwealth, p. 142. Call on Macmillan
&
Blatspeil
: Tower: H P sups.

29. Tu. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Write to P H G . Seek H Rogers : call on Sturmy ; adv. Curtis jr
: Booth au soir.

31. W. Commonwealth, p. 145/2. Seek Davison : call on Sturmy
: meet Curtis jr
.

May 1. Th. Seek Davison : meet Snow : call on H P
n &
Kenney
: Kenney au soir.

2. F. Commonwealth, p. 145. Call on Davison
n (ansr ),
L C Lamb
n &
Knowles
: meet Hume : H P sups.

3. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 146. Write to Mackintosh : call on Kenney
&
Sou. Smith
: Tower: meet H Robinson : theatre, 3/10 As You Like It.
May 4. Su. Commonwealth, p. 149. H P & Kenney sup.

5. M. Commonwealth, p. 151/2. Call on Mackintosh
: H M sups. meet Bt
. Write to Colburn ( Stewartâs bill). Three miss Lambes call.

6. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 152/2. Write to M W G , Whitaker & Bt
: Hayward , Farris , Williams & Ruddal call: meet M .

7. W. Commonwealth, p. 153/2. Medwin calls: call on Pouncy
: H P au soir.

8. Th. Commonwealth, p. 154. Call on Bazet , &c, &
Upcot
: theatre, Clari. Hudson calls.

9. F. Commonwealth, p. 158/2. Write to Taylor (Norwich)
& L C Lamb . Call on Whitaker
: Exhibition: meet H Palmer : tea E Whiteâs
.

10. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 159. Lefanu jr calls: Anderson, bookseller, at tea: sup at
H Pâs
.

May 11. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on Jo G ; adv. N G, & grandson
.

12. M. Commonwealth, p. 161/2. Call on Simpkin
&
Prouet
:
theatre, Vision of Sun, w. M J, W & H M
. Macmillan calls.

13. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 162. Museum; Blake : call on R Taylor
: Burnet & Reeves call.

14. W. Platitude. Commonwealth, p. 160/2. Call on Simpkin
&
Sturmy
: Anderson calls.

15. Th. Commonwealth, p. 164/2. Anderson & mrs Williams call: Hudson dines: sup at
do
, w. M J . Booth at tea.
16. F. Commonwealth, p. 165. Anderson calls: Ditto sups.

17. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 166. Call on Sturmy
, &
Rodd ; adv. Triphook .

May 18. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Seek L C Lamb : call on Aldis
n .

19. M. Giddiness. Commonwealth, p. 167/2. Call on
Hayward
&
Colburn
.

20. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 170/2. Write to Burnet . Seek L C Lamb : call on 2 Rodds
.

21. W. Commonwealth, p. 171/2. Call on Whitaker
&
Beadnel
: Tower: Olympic, Alexandre.
22. Th. Commonwealth, p. 175/2. Burnet, 100.

23. F. Commonwealth, p. 179. Call on Davison
n : Stewart calls. French at Madrid .

24. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 181/2. Call on Morgan, Dover Street
: Skeffington calls.

May 25. Su. Commonwealth, p. 183/2. Call on Davison
n ,
Hayward
,
H P
&
Dr Addison
.

26. M. Commonwealth, p. 184. Call on Skeffington
: Macgowan calls.

27. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 186. Call on Paxton
,
Upcot
&
Davison
n .
28. W. Commonwealth, p. 189. Seek L C Lamb : meet H Palmer .

29. Th. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. British Institution : seek Davison : A Curran au soir; adv.Booth
.

30. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Write to M W G . Call on Davison
.

31. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 190/2. Call on Vines
&
Watt
. Counter Revolution of Portugal .
June 1. Su. Commonwealth, p. 193/2. Mrs Hamilton calls: H P dines: A Curran at tea.

2. M. Commonwealth, p. 194. Call on Colburn
: Skeffington calls n .

3. Tu. Call on Pouncy
, &
Rodd ; adv. Henderson & Maccoul
: call on M Lamb
: sup at Lambâs , w. Procter, Wainewright, Pateman, Kenney, Alsop & Talfourds; adv. H Robinson
. Seek L C Lamb .

4. W. Commonwealth, p. 196/2. Quentin Durward, fin. Call on Davison
.
Mrs Taylor of Norwich dies .

5. Th. Commonwealth, p. 197/2. Woodfall calls: call on Davison ; adv. M & T Wilkie
: Stewart, LubÃ©s, Kenney & H P sup.

6. F. Commonwealth, p. 201/2. Call on O Rees (Longmanâs)
: Kenney sups.
7. Sa. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Booth, E Hamilton & A Curran at tea. Henderson calls na .

June 8. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on L C Lamb
na .
9. M. Commonwealth, p. 203/2. Keir at tea.
10. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 204. Theatre, 1/2 Richard.

11. W. Call on Medwin
,
Hume
, &
L C Lamb
na , &
Aldis
n .

12. Th. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Preface to Enquirer, 2 pp. Call on Macmillan
.

13. F. Call on L C Lamb & W Lamb ,
Nash
n &
Rodd
. Write to Mackintosh . Theatre, 1/4 Wild Oats. Constable sups.

14. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 205. Mackintosh calls: Booth at tea; adv. Henderson
. Ferdinand VII at Cadiz .

June 15. Su. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Dine at Humeâs , w. Tollemache & W : call on Wallace
: sir C Aldis & A Curran call n .

16. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Aldis calls: call on Sturmy
: theatre, Venice Pd; adv. O Rees
.

17. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 206. Call on Constable
n &
Rodd
.

18. W. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on R Taylor
: L Kenney & A Mercier call. Write for Booth , 2 pp.

19. Th. Enquirer; on Beggars, 2 pp. Write to Pouncy & Stewart & Mackintosh . Call on Wallace
: E Hamilton sups: theatre, 2/3 Figaro, & mrs Smith.

20. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on Talfourd
: Surry, 1/10 Hamlet.
21. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 208/2. H P sups: Booth at tea.

June 22. Su. Commonwealth, p. 209/2. Call on Kenney
n , & (proxy) Mackintosh
: E Hamilton calls, ppc. Enqr; note on Brutus.
23. M. Commonwealth, p. 210. Letter fr. Mackintosh ( L Dudley ); write to Ayrton . Kenneys & H P dine.

24. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 212/2. Write to Murray (on do ) & H Robinson . Colburn calls: call on Northcote
.
25. W. Commonwealth, p. 214. Write to Mackintosh , Hill & H Robinson .

26. Th. Commonwealth, p. 216/2. Call on Bain
: H & S P sup; S P sleeps .
27. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. H & S P dine: meet H Rodd .

28. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 216. Enquirer; English Style, 2 pp. Call on E Blagdon
: Booth au soir. Ayrton & Talfourd n call: write to Mackintosh .

June 29. Su. Commonwealth, p. 217, 218. Call on Hayward
&
Jo G
: N G calls: hear Irving, Caledn Church .
30. M. Commonwealth, p. 219. H P au soir.

July 1. Su. Commonwealth, p. 221 (Naseby). Call on Galloway
&
Woodfall
: Bt calls, & E White n .

2. W. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on mrs Johnson, Eastcheap
: H P sups.

3. Th.
London Institution; Ragland : Call on Nash
: Haydon, Raising of Lazarus:
Ayrton calls:
Henderson calls & sups .

4. F. Commonwealth, p. 222. Museum & Institution : call on Laird
. Write to Taylor, Norwich
.

5. Sa. Enquirer, revise. Hatchetâs, for Albemarle Strt
: theatre, Lyceum; adv. Ayrton
.

July 6. Su. Commonwealth, p. 224/2. Call on Bt
n : M calls. Raeburn dies .

7. M. Commonwealth, p. 225/2. Enquirer, revise. Excise Office: call on Bt
n : M calls: Prentise at tea: theatre, Sweethearts & Wives:
Lamb calls n . M J for Rochester, 7 nights.

8. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 225, & 1/2 page. Museum; Tho. Hollis, &c. Goodliff & Child call; call on Lamb
n : Bt sups.

9. W. Commonwealth, p. 226/2. Write to Anderson & M J : call on Rodd
: Ayrton & Bt call.

10. Th. Commonwealth, p. 227/2. Enquirer, 1 1/2 pp. Sup at
Lambs , w. Kenneys, F Ht & W . Write to M J .

11. F. Commonwealth, p. 229/2. Call on W B Whitaker
&
Hume
: meet H Robinson : theatre, Free & Easy.

12. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 230. Call on Rodd
,
Blatspeil
&
R Taylor
: A Curran calls.
July 13. Su. Commonwealth, p. 232/2. Kenneys dine: H Robinson au soir.

14. M. Commonwealth, p. 232.
M J at home : Thrup sups.
15. Tu. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Museum; sir R Bulstrode : T T at tea.

16. W. Commonwealth, p. 234/2. Call on W B Whitaker
: theatre, Knight of Snowdoun. Macmillan calls.

17. Th. Commonwealth, p. 235. Call on Hume
&
Curtis jr
, w. Sturmy : Lambs & L Kenney call: Kenney sups.
18. F. Commonwealth, p. 236. Museum; Lilburne : meet Hill & Black .

19. Sa. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Call on L C Lamb , by mistake, na , &
Rodd
: mrs Williams at tea. Parliament prorogued.

July 20. Su. Commonwealth, p. 239/2. Call on Haywd
: A Curran sups; adv. W Curran
.

21. M. Commonwealth, p. 241/2.
Museum; Lilburne .
22. Tu. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Write to M W S . Hudson dines.

23. W. Commonwealth, p. 242/2.
Museum; Lilburne : call on Tomsey
,
Carlon
n &
Rowland
n .

24. Th. Commonwealth, p. 243. Museum; Lilbe
: Ayrton calls: seek Peacock : A Curran au soir. Tomsey calls.

25. F. Commonwealth, p. 244/2.
Museum; Lilburne . Call on Peacock
.

26. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 246/2. Call on Jo G
,
Brown Warden
,
Davison
n &
Sturmy
: W Curran calls n : Booth at tea.

July 27. Su. Indisposed. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Miss Curran at tea; adv. L Kenney
.

28. M.
Museum; Lilburne .
Theatre, w. M J, Kenneys, H M & W
: Kenneys sup:
Frankenstein .

29. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 247/2. Write to M W S . Museum; Lilburne . Call on Davison
&
R Taylor
.
30. W. Commonwealth, p. 247. Hone & A Curran call. Museum; Lilburne .

31. Th. Commonwealth, p. 249. Museum; Lilburne . Call on Routh (Africa),
Hone
, &
Hodges (Saunders): H M dines. call at Davisonâs
.

Aug. 1. F. Commonwealth, p. 251/2. Call on Bonsor
&
Davisons
: Graham, junr , calls.

2. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 252/2. Write to Anderson : call on Davison
:
L Kenney dines, ppc : Woodfall & Augusts Hippisley call.
Aug. 3. Su. Commonwealth; notes on New Elections, & Lilburne.

4. M. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. M calls: call at
Davisonâs
. Prentice sups.

5. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 253. Call on Whitaker
&
Davison
: mrs Williams calls.

6. W. Commonwealth, p. 254/2. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Graham, junr calls: theatre, Is He Jealous?

7. Th. Commonwealth, p. 255. Write to Ayrton . Call on Whitaker
&
Pouncy
: mrs Williams calls: W Curran sups.

8. F. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Write to M W S, Paris
. Prentice sups.
9. Sa. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Mrs Williams na & mrs Sampson Perry call: Booth at tea: theatre, Loveâs Dream.
Aug. 10. Su. Commonwealth, p. 259.

11. M. Commonwealth, p. 261/2. H M sups. Giddiness.
Frankenstein, 2d Edition
.

12. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 261. Write to Anderson & Murray . Call on Macgowan
: A Curran calls.

13. W. Commonwealth, Ã§ala. Write to Ayrton & Mackintosh . White of Isleworth
& mrs Williams call; Booth at tea.
